resources.string:
We have updated our Tech confirmation process to optimize communication and insight between Buyer and Provider which we are calling Flightboard
  • The day before an assigned work order you will get a notification at 6am to confirm your work.
  • For each assigned work order, you will be required to click confirm by noon.
  • The day of the work order, you can mark on my way when heading to the job to inform Buyer of your location.
  • You can indicate that you will be running late to inform the Buyer
  • For all the details, please visit: Learn more about Flightboard
A note on GPS usage - We highly encourage you to enable GPS usage when using the Field Nation App to take advantage of the new process and potentially avoid dispatcher calls. We will be sending your location to the Buyer only when you hit "on my way" and will stop once you click "check in" in order to minimally affect your cell phone\'s battery life.

• Fixed crashes caused by rotating the phone while uploading photos
  • Fixed app getting stuck in retry loop while downloading files
  • Bullet points now show up in work order descriptions

• New look and feel
  • More work order search options
